reviewText: Two professional `cleaners' are hired to collect a frozen corpse, located high in the mountains and are to dispose of it in an old warehouse, unaware the body belongs to a political activist named Darius, brutally assassinated by Nat-Tech Corp. after injecting himself with a deadly virus. That's what Ground Zero is all about but I don't know if that's enough.I'm a big supporter of low-budget movies. Through the years, I've seen quite a few that were great movies, then others that were real stinkers. Take a guess where I'd put Ground Zero at. Sadly, it'd be on the lower end of that spectrum. For a zombie movie, it was okay. It did keep my interest in my watching it and the cinematography was good. However, there were times when this movie was an absolute bore..then, it'd pick up the pace only to bore me again. Seemed as though it was having a hard time making up its' mind what it was wanting to do.Ground Zero is worthy of a rental, if nothing else. It's not THAT bad of a zombie movie. Don't let other reviewers fool you.

reviewText: This movie was not as dreadful as I expected it to be. I actually didn't feel like I had once again been raped by Amazon when I rented this movie. Not overly gory (not that I dislike gore), and not overly scary (a shortcoming). It was reasonably well made despite its obvious low budget and well worth a $2.99 or less rental. If you pay more than that you might feel differently I don't know. If I would have paid $3.99 I would have found myself on the "cusp" of feeling slightly ripped off but overall it was worth the approx. hour and a half that the movie took away from my life and I was somewhat entertained by viewing the movie.I would not buy a disc of this movie, even a low priced used version. You will not want to view it more than once in my opinion.

reviewText: I really hesitated on renting this one.  I can't tell you why...something about the review offered with the movie didn't click.  I'm glad I took the chance.  Yes, there are definite issues with the script...the screen writer is either under 35 or has perfectly captured the self-abosrbed, we're-all-reality-stars mentality of that generation, which the characters so perfectly exhibit...they move too slowly to really be at work, they react too slowly to anything outside of their "normal", they spend too much time on their own peculiar angst about relationships, friendships, know-it-all-ness, etc.  YET-based on my own experiences in the real world, this is the real way people that age act...and thus, it works.  A little slow at moments, overall very well done....I'd give it four stars.  Also, heads up, a very differnt "zombie beginning" and setting for the outbreak.  Loved it.

reviewText: This film is what happens when an untalented writer tries too hard to make a Tarantino-type, dialogue-driven film.  Doesn't work.And throughout all of the film, when the charaters were supposedly pressed for time, they sure did move slowly and casually.Dumb.

reviewText: It is really cheesy, but what do you expect from an independent film?  I love seeing my hubby act and adore how proud he is of this film.  He had a blast making it.  If you are looking for a really awesome zombie flick, full of gore and special effects, you may want to look elsewhere; but, if you are looking for a fun, interesting storyline, and great actors/characters than you will enjoy this movie.

reviewText: Gave the movie a 4----give stars a 5, because the photo on the cover of the DVD, is really what you get to see in the film (so few Indy Film Covers do that these days) - so you already have an idea that they put work into the effects -- on to the story -- VERY refreshing to see a new spin on a zombie film, and was very pleased.  Starts off very 28 days later-ish ----then breaks into legitimate zombie creation, not just "infected" (in this film, you gotta die, then the virus mutates, and you come back and very-very infectious).  As I said, an Indy film but good scripting, well acted and funny were funny worked --film quality was good and they spent $$ on it, so looked nice----- it kept my interest and is one I won't hesitate to watch over and over again.  I got no problem suggesting you get it and for the price, really cannot beat it -- you will get your  $$ worth......I really liked it becuase it really quirked off the meter, but lots of folks did not care for it, so rent first.  Personally, I liked it.

reviewText: I have to say that this movie was better than I expected but at the same time it's amazing to me that a movie would have characters in it that didn't have a clue about zombies. Is there anyone out there that doesn't know what to expect during a zombie outbreak?? What's the first rule oh yeah, double tap to the head! Anyway, the movie is about a cleanup crew cleaning up some murdered activists for a gangster one of which turns out to be a zombie! There is some black humor in the whole premise but I admit I have a very dark sense of humor. If you don't have anything better to do this movie is worth a look as a rental but I wouldn't buy it.

reviewText: This is a gem of a movie.  It's an indie movie, that does everything well. The plot is well thought out, interesting and makes sense. SFX are very good - big budget movie level, especially considering an indie movie budget.  It's like a day in the life... with zombies. Fun, tense and surpising at moments.  Rent this movie, or buy it, if you collect zombie movies like I do.
summary: Scares, laughs and a well thought out script
